languages.text: {n}Глаза Маражая широко распахиваются в неверии.{/n} "Что?" {n}Друкари замирает, явно растерявшись.{/n} "Нет. Нет, ты не можешь... ты не можешь... отказаться от меня! Мы связаны узами обладания, {name}! Пускай когда-то это было игрой, но после всего, через что ты прош{mf|ел|ла} под моей опекой... после клейма..." {n}Голос Маражая дрожит от гнева — и неприкрытого страха.{/n}

{n}Marazhai's eyes go wide in disbelief.{/n} "What?" {n}He freezes, clearly confused.{/n} "No. No, you cannot... you cannot... abandon me! We are bound by the ties of possession, {name}! It may have once been a game, but after all you have been through in my charge... after the branding..." {n}Marazhai's voice is shaking with anger — and unconcealed fear.{/n}

Мы связаны узами обладания, {name}! Пускай когда-то это было игрой, но после всего, через что ты прош{mf|ел|ла} под моей опекой... после клейма..." {n}Голос Маражая дрожит от гнева — и неприкрытого страха.{/n}

It may have once been a game, but after all you have been through in my charge... after the branding..." {n}Marazhai's voice is shaking with anger — and unconcealed fear.{/n}

It may have once been a game, but after all you have been through in my charge... after the branding..." {n}Marazhai's voice is shaking with anger — and unconcealed fear.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋难以置信地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“你说什么？”{n}他僵在原地，一脸困惑。{/n}“不。不，你不能……你不能……抛弃我！我们之间是占有与被占有的关系，{name}！或许这原本只是一场游戏，但你一直都在听从我的指示……还打上了烙印……”{n}玛拉斋的声音颤抖着，充满了愤怒——以及无法掩饰的恐惧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes go wide in disbelief.{/n} "What?" {n}He freezes, clearly confused.{/n} "No. No, you cannot... you cannot... abandon me! We are bound by the ties of possession, {name}! It may have once been a game, but after all you have been through in my charge... after the branding..." {n}Marazhai's voice is shaking with anger — and unconcealed fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋难以置信地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“你说什么？”{n}他僵在原地，一脸困惑。{/n}“不。不，你不能……你不能……抛弃我！我们之间是占有与被占有的关系，{name}！或许这原本只是一场游戏，但你一直都在听从我的指示……还打上了烙印……”{n}玛拉斋的声音颤抖着，充满了愤怒——以及无法掩饰的恐惧。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai abre los ojos como platos, sin dar crédito a lo que ve.{/n} «¿Qué?». {n}Se queda paralizado, visiblemente confundido.{/n} «No. No, tú no puedes... ¡no puedes... abandonarme! ¡Nos unen lazos de posesión, {name}! Puede que una vez fuese un juego, pero después de todo lo que has vivido bajo mi tutela... después de la marca...». {n}La voz de Marazhai tiembla de furia... y de miedo apenas contenido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes go wide in disbelief.{/n} "What?" {n}He freezes, clearly confused.{/n} "No. No, you cannot... you cannot... abandon me! We are bound by the ties of possession, {name}! It may have once been a game, but after all you have been through in my charge... after the branding..." {n}Marazhai's voice is shaking with anger — and unconcealed fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai abre los ojos como platos, sin dar crédito a lo que ve.{/n} «¿Qué?». {n}Se queda paralizado, visiblemente confundido.{/n} «No. No, tú no puedes... ¡no puedes... abandonarme! ¡Nos unen lazos de posesión, {name}! Puede que una vez fuese un juego, pero después de todo lo que has vivido bajo mi tutela... después de la marca...». {n}La voz de Marazhai tiembla de furia... y de miedo apenas contenido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Marazhai s'écarquillent sous le coup de la surprise.{/n} « Quoi ? » {n}Il se fige, visiblement déstabilisé.{/n} « Non. Non, vous ne pouvez pas... vous ne pouvez pas m'abandonner ! Nous sommes liés, {name} ! C'était peut-être un simple jeu au départ, mais après tout ce que vous avez traversé à mes côtés... après le marquage... » {n}La voix de Marazhai tremble de colère, mais aussi d'une peur qu'il ne cherche pas à dissimuler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes go wide in disbelief.{/n} "What?" {n}He freezes, clearly confused.{/n} "No. No, you cannot... you cannot... abandon me! We are bound by the ties of possession, {name}! It may have once been a game, but after all you have been through in my charge... after the branding..." {n}Marazhai's voice is shaking with anger — and unconcealed fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Marazhai s'écarquillent sous le coup de la surprise.{/n} « Quoi ? » {n}Il se fige, visiblement déstabilisé.{/n} « Non. Non, vous ne pouvez pas... vous ne pouvez pas m'abandonner ! Nous sommes liés, {name} ! C'était peut-être un simple jeu au départ, mais après tout ce que vous avez traversé à mes côtés... après le marquage... » {n}La voix de Marazhai tremble de colère, mais aussi d'une peur qu'il ne cherche pas à dissimuler.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Augen weiten sich ungläubig.{/n} "Was?" {n}Offensichtlich verwirrt erstarrt er.{/n} "Nein. Nein, Ihr dürft ... mich nicht ... zurücklassen! Wir sind durch die Bande des Besitzes aneinander gebunden, {name}! Es mag als Spiel begonnen haben, aber nach allem, was Ihr unter meiner Führung durchgemacht habt ... nach dem Brandmarken ..." {n}Marazhais Stimme zittert vor Wut – und blanker Angst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes go wide in disbelief.{/n} "What?" {n}He freezes, clearly confused.{/n} "No. No, you cannot... you cannot... abandon me! We are bound by the ties of possession, {name}! It may have once been a game, but after all you have been through in my charge... after the branding..." {n}Marazhai's voice is shaking with anger — and unconcealed fear.{/n}

Es mag als Spiel begonnen haben, aber nach allem, was Ihr unter meiner Führung durchgemacht habt ... nach dem Brandmarken ..." {n}Marazhais Stimme zittert vor Wut – und blanker Angst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}信じられないと言った様子でマラズハイが目を見開く。{/n}「何だと？」{n}凍りついたように固まった彼は、明らかに混乱していた。{/n}「いいや、そんなはずはない…お前にそんなことが…俺を見捨てることなど！俺たちは執着の絆で結ばれているのだぞ、{name}！かつては遊びだったのかもしれないが、俺の元でお前が経験したことは…烙印の後に…」{n}マラズハイの声は怒りと…解き放たれた恐怖で震えていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes go wide in disbelief.{/n} "What?" {n}He freezes, clearly confused.{/n} "No. No, you cannot... you cannot... abandon me! We are bound by the ties of possession, {name}! It may have once been a game, but after all you have been through in my charge... after the branding..." {n}Marazhai's voice is shaking with anger — and unconcealed fear.{/n}

We are bound by the ties of possession, ! It may have once been a game, but after all you have been through in my charge... after the branding..." {n}Marazhai's voice is shaking with anger — and unconcealed fear.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri hayretle açılıyor.{/n} "Ne?" {n}Kafa karışıklığı aşikâr olarak donakalıyor.{/n} "Hayır. Olamaz. Sen... Beni... Sen beni terk edemezsin! Birbirimize sahiplik, bizi bağlıyor {name}! Bir vakitler her şey bir oyundu belki ancak idarem altında... Damgadan sonra yaşadığın onca şey..." {n}Marazhai'ın sesi, öfke ve... Saklayamadığı bir korkuyla titriyor.{/n}

We are bound by the ties of possession, {name}! It may have once been a game, but after all you have been through in my charge... after the branding..." {n}Marazhai's voice is shaking with anger — and unconcealed fear.{/n}
